item.looseprinces-tool.flying_rune.toolt: A mystical rune that grants flight
item.looseprinces-tool.fair_duel.tooltip: Adjust the player's damage received by the percentage of the damage caused by the holder to other living beings (ignoring damage reduction and additional effects) to the same percentage.
effect.looseprinces-tool.fair_duel.desc: Scale incoming damage by last dealt percent
item.looseprinces-tool.imperfect_divinit: A fragment of divine power flows within you
Grants Imperfect Divinity (Resistance V + Fair Duel) while in inventory
item.looseprinces-tool.complete_divinity: You are blessed by the God's Power
Grants God's Power (Invincible + Flight) while in inventory
effect.looseprinces-tool.imperfect_divin: Gain Resistance V and activate Fair Duel
effect.looseprinces-tool.divine_power.de: Invincible, disables Fair Duel, and grants flight
item.looseprinces-tool.flying_rune.story:
Gazing up at the heavens. That sacred realm where mortals dare not look.
Fear? No. That was never your choice. With mortal hands, you crafted a blasphemous ritual, forcibly tearing a streak of light from Their pristine wings.
Now this imprisoned radiance pulses within your rune—this is your stolen freedom, your first badge of rebellion cast toward the sky.
item.looseprinces-tool.fair_duel.story:
You once gazed upon that untouchable existence. It mocked your frailty, yet with arrogant mercy, bestowed upon you a covenant of trial.
Henceforth, the strong and the weak are measured not by might, but by the scars they bear.
This is both reward for your challenge, and punishment for your hubris.
item.looseprinces-tool.imperfect_divinit:
The fire-stealer shall be burned by flame. The divinity you seized through blasphemy, like shattered mirror fragments, forcibly reassembles within your soul.
It grants you an unbreakable body, yet makes you constantly taste the agony of divine rejection of mortal flesh.
This is no blessing, but a shackle.
It is your first step toward the immortal throne—a path of thorns, with no return.
item.looseprinces-tool.complete_divinity:
Pain has ceased. Divinity and your soul have completed their final fusion.
You have healed the fractured godhead, which means you have utterly severed your mortality.
Harm loses meaning before you. The sky bows in submission.
You have achieved immortality.Your life shall no longer be eroded by time; your power shall know no end. You stand equal with the divine.
You have gained the power to touch the loom of reality
You reached for the thread that weaves reality

The throne is not the end. At the edge of your sight, you beheld the loom of fate,
and beyond it—the silent figure of the Creator. As a god already, you chose once more.
You reached out again, to seize the right to weave reality. You succeeded.
Yet the Creator did not strike you down—only cast a single glance.
Grants 'Creator' while in inventory; press %s to open input to %s item(s) (then %s seconds cooldown)
Grants 'Creator' while in inventory; press %s to open input to %s item(s) (then %s seconds cooldown)

You could not suppress your curiosity and desire, and invoked this supreme power.
%s
After that, your divinity fell silent, making you taste mortal frailty once more.
What you possess can be stripped away at will.
You remain so very fragile...
You obtained what you wanted, at a price...
You used your own possessions to touch it...
effect.looseprinces-tool.creator: Creator
effect.looseprinces-tool.creator.desc: Equivalent to 'God's Power', and allows key-triggered item receive (starts cooldown)
Displays remaining cooldown time; cannot end cooldown by clearing it
screen.looseprinces-tool.creator.title: Creator: Obtain Item
screen.looseprinces-tool.creator.need_ef: You need the 'Creator' effect to use this
advancements.looseprinces-tool.root.desc: With mortal body, rule the divine.
advancements.looseprinces-tool.wings.des: Bind the sky's dominion to the rune.
advancements.looseprinces-tool.god_scale: Judge the mortals by their wounds.
advancements.looseprinces-tool.thorn_cro: Forcibly wear the crown of divinity.
advancements.looseprinces-tool.throne.de: Ascend the throne, taste the eternity of silence.
